1: I seek you earnestly, finding fulfillment in my deepest thirst.
2: I experience your power and glory in every moment.
3: I praise you for your loving kindness every day.
4: I bless others and uplift them with my hands.
5: I feel fulfilled and joyfully express my gratitude.
6: I find peace and clarity in quiet reflection each night.
7: I rejoice in the comfort of your support.
8: I pursue goodness and feel supported in every step.
9: Those who seek my soul discover their own path.
10: They find strength and purpose in every challenge.
11: I rejoice in God and celebrate truth.
